page.title: 18SCHOOLS IN DRUMNADROCHIT
page.content: {Drumnadrochit}has both a primary and a secondary school,which originally shared the same{1892}site. A new primary school was built in 1978.At present it has 72 pupils in 4 classes. However the number of pupils is dropping which means there will only be 3 teachers in the new session resulting in more composite classes. {The secondary}has 100 pupils coming not only from Drumnadrochit but also from Glenurquhart,Glenmoriston and Cannich (up to 23 miles away).There are 10 full time teachers and 5 part time.Improvments have been made demolishing some of the old buildings and replacing them by demountables. In the first 2 years pupils take 13 different{subjects}.By the end of 2nd year they have to choose specific subjects from the 17 on offer for 'O'grade and 'H'grade courses.
